Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Clear Adderkin Jungle of hostile fauna so that troops can safely move through the area.

Top priorities are populations of {@LinkCreature:10#11#naga slayers}, {@LinkCreature:10#12#caiman serfs}, {@LinkCreature:10#5#thickbark ghilliedhus}, {@LinkCreature:10#6#agitated mycanars}, and {@LinkCreature:10#21#ebon sabertooths}. Report to Libine at the Costal Overwatch upon completion.
Adderkin Jungle is good groundâ€”and now it's our ground, <PCNAME>.
Jungle warfare is serious business, <PCNAME>. You got your game face on?
